name: DeckSouls
description:
This is a deck building rogue-like! Build upon your deck to become an unstoppable force and clear out all enemies in your path!

Controls:

All interactions are done with your mouse:

Click encounter to fight the next beast or enter the next shop.

Click an enemy to select them, and a card to select it. Click a card again to confirm your choice to play it.

Click the arrow to edit your deck (only possible in between encounters). Click cards under "Collection" to add to your deck and "Deck" to remove them.

In a shop, click a card to purchase it, or click "Sell" to view your collection and click on them to sell them.

The UI on the left side represents your health, deck size, and various energies. 

Cards have descriptions, but note that "Consumed" cards are 1 use only and will be removed from your deck.

Your deck most be 10 or more cards, and your hand size is limited to 7.

***This is a game jam submission***
